title: Lt. Kent: Lone Wolf
description: BEAUTY AND THE LONE WOLFWounded in body, weary in soul, lone wolf Lt. Jason Kent had bid farewell to civilization — secluding himself in his dark Montana mansion. Few dared to interrupt his self-imposed exile. But one determined woman had boldly invaded his home.Like a moth to a flame, journalist Angie Rose would not be driven away from Jason's side. She arrived on his doorstep to unveil the rugged soldier… the hero… the mysterious millionaire. But how could she reveal the secrets that Jason revealed to her in the darkness — when neither could hide their emotions, when they were alone and defenseless and dependent upon each other....
author: Judith Lyons
